ygData.subject: RE: Putting Skill-Cap Questions to Rest
ygData.msgSnippet: When you get it done, email me a word file and I ll convert to PDF and post urls for both so ppl can grab with their browser (and upload to our onelist dot com
ygData.messageBody:
When you get it done, email me a word file and I'll convert to PDF and post
urls for both so ppl can grab with their browser (and upload to our onelist
dot com files area for this mailing list - and/or send to tallies for him to
upload same.)

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 29th song
<Spirit of the Moon>
somewhere on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Tuesday, September 28, 1999 2:59 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Putting Skill-Cap Questions to
Rest

From: <kim@...>

On Tue, 28 Sep 1999, Mike Roach wrote:
>
> I have that info on my chart and will publish my info to
you all when I feel
> that the skill cap stuff is accurate enough. If no one
minds I will send
> the chart as a Word97 format attachement verified virus
free when complete.

Usually the best way to distribute proprietary-format files
is
via email directly to people who request it, or via a web or
ftp site.

--
John H. Kim
